Module paths
Package edu.ntnu.idatt2001.paths.controllers

Class LanguageController

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idatt2001.paths.controllers.LanguageController
public class LanguageController extends Object
The type Language controller. Singleton class for the language controller Can be accessed from anywhere in the program. This class is responsible for handling the language of the game.
Version:
1.1 15.05.2023
Author:
Helle R. and Sander S.

    • isInternetAvailable

      public boolean isInternetAvailable()
      Is internet available boolean. Checks if the internet is available Used to check if the google translate API can be used
      Returns:
      returns true if the internet is available, false if not

    • translate

      public String translate(String sourceText)
      Translate string. Translates the source text to the current language If the internet is not available or the target language is the same as the source language, return the source text
      Parameters:
      sourceText - the text to be translated
      Returns:
      the translated text
